channel.description: So, I am still extremely new to all of this, but I am a fast learner. How can I add the progress bar to tutorial island, and where do I adjust all the npcs dialogue and items you get from them? Finally where do I change exp rates? Thanks for the help!

item.dc:creator: @UndeadDino UndeadDino
